 * Var name
  * Capital letter for each words.
  * word are collapsed.
  Example : 
  <code>local Variable
local MyVariable = false
local TooLongVarNameOfDoom</code>
 * end of instruction
  * *None* aka *no* <code>local Var = 0;</code>
 * functions name
  * No-capital letter on the first word.
  * Each words are collapsed.
  * Capital letter at the begin of each words.
  * Object Name act like variables.
  Example:<code>local function()
end
local myFunction()
end
local arandomFunction(Var, OtherVar)
end
Meta:function()
end
local EntityInQuestion:thefunctionName()
end</code>
 * Arrays act like variables
 Example: <code>local Array = {}
Array.key = 12</code>
